name: single-runtime
description: Control Sharing Panel. Lets you change share resolver in the app via GUI

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
scripts.legacy:e2e:ci: pnpm legacy:start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
